price: 68. Mpe soki basuanisi yo, loba: Allah ayebi maye bozali kosala.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
